metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9516 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description:
In hid_debug_events_read of drivers/hid/hid-debug.c, there is a possibleout of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions:Android kernel Android ID: A-71361580.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-9516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-134.160
